heroSubtitle: Upload your documents, chat with our AI, and discover government schemes you're eligible for - all in Hindi and English
feature1Desc: Upload Aadhaar, income certificates - AI extracts your details
feature2Desc: Watson AI helps you discover eligible government schemes
feature3Desc: Get personalized recommendations based on your profile
uploadInstructions: Upload your Aadhaar card, income certificate, or any government ID to extract your details automatically
extracting: Extracting your details from the document
detailsExtracted: Your details have been extracted successfully
uploadToSeeDetails: Upload a document to see extracted details here
chatWelcome: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. I can see you're from {state}. Let me help you find eligible government schemes.
incomeQuestion: What is your monthly family income?
incomeConfirm: Thank you for sharing your income details.
familyQuestion: How many family members do you have?
processingInfo: Perfect! I have all the information I need. Let me analyze your profile and find the best government schemes for you.
analysisComplete: Great! Based on your profile, I found {count} government schemes you're eligible for. Let me show you the details.
foundSchemes: We found {count} government schemes you're eligible for
name: Name
nextStepsDesc: Click on any scheme above to download pre-filled application forms and learn about the application process.
formsPreFilled: Forms are pre-filled with your details
submitOnline: Submit online or at nearest office
formReady: Your pre-filled application form is ready for download
offlineSubmissionDesc: Print form and visit nearest office
footerAbout: AI-powered platform to help Indian citizens discover and apply for government schemes with ease. Built for PRARAMBH 2025.
